PUT: Tunnel through a GET with attributes in the query string name value pairs
Tunnel through a POST with attributes in POST content name values pairs

netid.description: Online account or network identifier of an individual

unlisted.description: A boolean indicator.  If true indicates the desire make the ID Card unlisted (unavailable) except to those who have a legitimate need to know

lost_stolen.description: A boolean indicator.  If true indicates that the ID Card has been lost or stolen

warnings: Non-Directory information is accessible only to yourself and to university personnel with a legitimate need to know

400.description: There appears to be a syntax error in the composition of the service request.

403.description: The user does not have access to the resource

404.description: The target resource cannot be found for the provided resouce identifiers

405.description: The service method is not supported by the service.

409.description: A conflict has occured. The response structure may contain information about the conflict.

500.description: An error occurred generating the response to the service request.

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: Name of the Id being updated

parameters.name: unlisted
parameters.description: Unlist/List a card from the public directory

parameters.name: lost_stolen
parameters.description: Report a card lost or stolen
